org.sql: SELECT SUM(spree_stock_items.count_on_hand) FROM spree_stock_items INNER JOIN spree_variants ON spree_stock_items.variant_id = spree_variants.id WHERE spree_stock_items.deleted_at IS NULL AND spree_variants.deleted_at IS NULL AND spree_variants.product_id = "$1"

rewrites.sql: SELECT SUM(spree_stock_items.count_on_hand) FROM spree_stock_items INNER JOIN spree_variants ON spree_stock_items.variant_id = spree_variants.id WHERE spree_stock_items.deleted_at IS NULL AND spree_variants.deleted_at IS NULL AND spree_variants.product_id = "$1" LIMIT 1
